title: I need to get out of low priority queue!!
body:
Ok so this is what happened: I was in champ select, my  client went ballistic and chose Miss Fortune. I thought it was going to crash and stuff up my pc so i quickly left and re joined (yes i was still willing to play) then i got a 5 match low priority queue for 10 mins 

halp

replies.body:
Even though you were able to make it back into the match, the amount of time that you were gone could have made all the difference in the game. Also, you won't be placed into low-priority queue for only one left match. I know it may suck that this was the deciding match that gave you an LPQ, but it's more important that we try to make sure that AWOL client doesn't happen again.

If the client is freezing or locking up, it might be due to some corrupt files somewhere. Grab our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and run it with the repatch option to make sure you've got a clean patch of the game.
The Low Priority Queue system is stupid!
